page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF....
page.content: MY MOTHER SHOUTS "JUDITH GET UP" SO I GET UP AND GO INTO THE BATHROOM. I GET WASHED AND DRESSED THEN I GO DOWNSTAIRS. IT IS 8.15. I HAVE MY BREAKFAST- PERHAPS A GLASS OF MILK AND A BISCUIT. AFTER I PUT MY CUP IN THE BASIN TO BE WASHED, I GET MY COAT AND SCHOOL BAG AND GO OFF TO SCHOOL. I SHOUT "CHEERIO MUM". SOMETIMES I GO FOR LEANNE NEXT DOOR AND WE WALK TO SCHOOL. ON ARRIVAL AT SCHOOL, I PLAY CHASES WITH THE GIRLS. I AM ALWAYS IT AT FIRST. WHEN THE BELL RINGS, WE RUN INTO LINES. WE DO OUR SPELLING, MATHS AND LANGUAGE UNTIL LUNCH TIME. AT 12.30, I HAVE MY LUNCH OF TOMATO SOUP. AFTER LUNCH, WE DO OUR PROJECT ON TEETH UNTIL 3.30 AND THE END OF SCHOOL. I PLAY WITH DIANNE UNTIL SUPPERTIME AT 6.00, I PLAY OUTSIDE UNTIL 9.00 THEN WATCH T.V. TILL BEDTIME. {BY JUDITH TAIT.
